member.name: CSV_QUERY_REDIRECT_STATE
member.summary: Contains information about whether files in a stream have been redirected.

member.name: CSV_QUERY_REDIRECT_STATE.MdsNodeId
member.summary: The identifier of an MDS node.

member.name: CSV_QUERY_REDIRECT_STATE.DsNodeId
member.summary: The identifier of a DS node.

member.name: CSV_QUERY_REDIRECT_STATE.FileRedirected
member.summary: TRUE if the file has been redirected; otherwise,FALSE.
